title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama server; works in Node, Deno, Bun and browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library; pip install ollama to chat, pull, push and embed with local models.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration that wraps Ollama as an LLM and chat provider for chains and agents.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-web/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat UI, model manager, multi-user, dark mode).

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-built interactive CLI wrapper with readline, syntax highlighting and conversation history.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns Ollama models into a local GitHub Copilot alternative.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem providing a simple client for chatting and pulling models from an Ollama server.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM library for Ollama (Kotlin friendly) with synchronous, asynchronous and reactive APIs.

title: ollama-chatbot
summary: Minimal React chatbot example that connects browser to local Ollama via ollama-js.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.0 integration to use Ollama models as generators in production-ready pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Unofficial .NET SDK for Ollama with async/await, streaming and dependency-injection helpers.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models using slash commands.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU and PVC templates.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Ready-to-run Docker Compose stacks (CPU & GPU) with web UI, Open-WebUI, and volume caching.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds local AI commands (summarize, rewrite, translate) via Ollama.

title: ollama-logseq
summary: LogSeq plugin to run Ollama models on blocks for Q&A, summarization and brainstorming.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing typed async client for Ollama’s REST API with tokio/hyper.

title: ollama-go
summary: Community Go client for Ollama with generated structs, streaming and context helpers.

title: ollama-model-gallery
summary: Curated list of community-created Modelfiles for code, role-play, function-calling and more.
